Name: KKR & Co LP
Description: KKR & Co. LP is a preeminent global investment firm, founded in 1976, that adeptly manages a diversified portfolio across private equity, credit, and real assets. Renowned for its innovative investment strategies and operational proficiency, KKR excels in identifying and capitalizing on complex market opportunities to foster long-term value creation. The firm's deep industry insights and extensive network underpin its success in driving growth within its portfolio companies. KKR is also dedicated to sustainable investing, emphasizing the integration of environmental, social, and governance (ESG) factors into its investment decisions, which reinforces its commitment to delivering strong performance for its investors. As a key player in the global financial landscape, KKR continues to shape the future of investment through its strategic approach and focus on responsible growth.
Address: 30 HUDSON YARDS, NEW YORK, NY, UNITED STATES, 10001
